text: Va ʙa xotiri pajmone, ki ʙo onho ʙasta ʙudem, kuhi Turro ʙar ʙoloi sarason ʙardostem va guftem: «Sacdakunon (ja'ne, sarhojatonro furu andoxta) az on dari Bajtudmuqaddas doxil saved va dar ruzi sanʙe az had maguzared, (ja'ne mohi nadored)». Va az onho pajmoni saxt giriftem, vale pajmonro sikastand
